title: Launcher and Icon are strange

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I had to uninstall LoL and when i downloaded it again, every time i launch the game i get "that the client update has begun" and i have old LoL icon.

It doesn't affect anything, i got in like always but my question is how do i fix it? It's for some reason frustrating for me. Thanks.

replies.body: That's the client update which will upgrade you to the newest version of the client. If you've completely uninstalled you'll need to go through this whole process.
I'd gladly upgrade but i don't know how.
I have the same problem. I installed LoL after a long time and now it shows message about upgrade, everytime I launch the game and icon is also old.
